name: North Carolina Department of Revenue (NCDOR)

description: The NCDOR has a Penalty Waiver Policy that allows taxpayers to request the removal or reduction of penalties assessed by the state. Taxpayers can submit Form NC-5500 (Request to Waive Penalties) or Form NC-5501 (for informational return penalties) to request relief
